testcase.classname: Validation of Adactin Hotel Web Application
testcase.name: TC_01_validation of AdactinHotel page with valid Credentials and to get Booking order ID
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the Adactin Hotel Web Application.........................passed When User enters the valid username and valid password......................passed And User click the login Button.............................................passed Then User Verify the Search Hotel options page is Displayed.................passed When User can be Select the Location,Hotel,Room Type,Number of Room,Checkin date,Checkout date,Adult per Room,Children per Room.passed And User can Click the search Hotel Button..................................passed Then User Verify the Select Hotel is Displayed..............................passed When User can be select the Radio Butten and Continue Button................passed Then User Verify the Book Hotel page is Displayed...........................passed When User can Enter the FirstName,LastName,Billing Address..................passed When User can Enter the Valid Credit Card Number,Credit Card Type,Credit Card Expiry Date,Credit Card Expiry Year,Credit Card CVV number.passed And User Can Click the Book Now Button......................................passed Then User Verify the Booking Confirmation page and Check Weather the Oder ID is Generated.passed
